Title: ASP.NET Identity Manager
Description: The management application for simply and clear administrating and controlling  of users and roles for Asp.Net Identity.
HomeWiki:
Project description

The management application for simply and clear administrating and controlling of users and roles for Asp.Net Identity.
Asp.Net Identity Manager is a application for managing ASP.Net Identity users, roles and their relations.

Summary

The management application for simply and clear administrating and controlling of users and roles for Asp.Net Identity.

Features

  • Initialize database for Asp.Net Identity
  • Create and delete users
  • Create and delete roles
  • Assign and un-assign users to roles
  • Reset user passwords (planned)
  • Use the Web.API with WebForms (planned)
  • Use Knockout (planned)
